price: Siku tutayo wakusanya wachamngu kuwapeleka kwa Arrahmani Mwingi wa Rehema kuwa ni wageni wake.
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَحۡشُرُ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ إِلَى ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ وَفۡدٗا

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yawma naḥshuru al-mutaqīna ilā al-raḥmāni wafdan
